content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) and another Wooden Chest at position (x=3.5, y=0.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) connecting the chests

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0) with a transport belt system connecting to various furnaces and chests

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5) connected to a Burner Inserter at position (x=-17.5, y=-64.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0)

### Transport Belt Systems
- BeltGroup connecting positions (x=-26.5, y=-65.5) to (x=-22.5, y=-65.5)
- BeltGroup connecting positions (x=-23.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-21.5, y=-64.5)
- BeltGroup connecting positions (x=-21.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-21.5, y=-66.5)
- BeltGroup connecting positions (x=-20.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-20.5, y=-66.5)
- BeltGroup connecting positions (x=-14.5, y=-63.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-65.5)
- BeltGroup connecting positions (x=-18.5, y=-63.5) to (x=-12.5, y=-58.5)
- BeltGroup connecting positions (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-17.5, y=-59.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure that the target tile is free of any existing entities before attempting to place a new entity. Remove any existing entity if necessary before placing another one.

### Errors due to lack of fuel or ingredients
- Regularly check and refuel mining drills and inserters to ensure continuous operation.
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to process to avoid idle time and warnings.
